## Seurat V3

```{r}
library(Matrix)
library(data.table)
library(Seurat)
library(SeuratDisk)
```

```{r}
sc_data_folder = '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_data/mouse_visium_snrna/'
sp_data_folder = '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/benchmarking/with_tissue_zones/data/'
results_folder = '/nfs/team205/vk7/sanger_projects/cell2location_paper/notebooks/selected_results/benchmarking/with_tissue_zones/real_mg/'


#Convert(paste0(sp_data_folder,'synth_adata_real_mg_20210131.h5ad'), dest = "h5seurat", overwrite = TRUE)
sp_seu = LoadH5Seurat(paste0(sp_data_folder,'synth_adata_real_mg_20210131.h5seurat'))
sp_seu = sp_seu[,sp_seu$sample == 'exper0']

reg_mod_name = 'RegressionGeneBackgroundCoverageTorch_51covariates_8111cells_12422geneswith_tissue_zones'
reg_path = paste0(results_folder, 'regression_model/',reg_mod_name,'/')
Convert(paste0(reg_path, 'sc.h5ad'), dest = "h5seurat", overwrite = TRUE)
sc_seu = LoadH5Seurat(paste0(reg_path, 'sc.h5seurat'))
Idents(sc_seu) = sc_seu$annotation_1
```

```{r}
# the column for annotations
sc_seu@meta.data$annotation_1 = factor(sc_seu@meta.data$annotation_1)
```

## running Seurat PCA

```{r seurat}
library(dplyr)

sc_seu <- SCTransform(sc_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)
sp_seu <- SCTransform(sp_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)

start_time <- Sys.time()

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = sc_seu, query = sp_seu, normalization.method = "SCT")

predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = sc_seu$annotation_1,
                                  weight.reduction = 'pcaproject')

end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
saveRDS(object = predictions.assay,
        file = paste0(results_folder, "seurat/results_pca.RDS"))

predictions.assay$spot = rownames(predictions.assay)
write.csv(predictions.assay, paste0(results_folder, "seurat/results_pca.csv"))
predictions.assay[1:5, 1:5]
```

## running Seurat CCA

```{r seurat_cca}
library(dplyr)

sc_seu <- SCTransform(sc_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)
sp_seu <- SCTransform(sp_seu, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE)

start_time <- Sys.time()

anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = sc_seu, query = sp_seu, normalization.method = "SCT", reduction='cca')

predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = sc_seu$annotation_1,
                                  weight.reduction = 'cca')

end_time <- Sys.time()
end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
saveRDS(object = predictions.assay,
        file = paste0(results_folder, "seurat/results_cca.RDS"))

predictions.assay$spot = rownames(predictions.assay)
write.csv(predictions.assay, paste0(results_folder, "seurat/results_cca.csv"))
predictions.assay[1:5, 1:5]
```
